name: Outdoor Research Fossil Rock Gloves - Unisex
description: Don't let belaying ruin your hands before your big send. The half finger cut keeps your fingers nimble for finicky aid gear placements and the leather palms with suede overlays protect your hands from abrasion on long belays. Great for your buddy's hangdog session or establishing new big walls.Breathable polyester and spandex back stretches for comfort.Durable goat leather palms with split suede overlays in high-wear zones protect your hands from abrasion.Kevlar stitching holds up to abrasion and high temperatures from rope friction.Hook-and-loop wrist closures for easy on-and-off between belays.
